cabra.dinero
Class PrizePack

java.lang.Object
  cabra.dinero.PrizePack

public class PrizePack
extends java.lang.Object

Contains a list of Prize Packs, which contain prizes of varying rarity. When you buy a Prize Pack, it opens up and a certain number of prizes pop up - you've just won them.

PRIZEPACKS

public static final PrizePack[] PRIZEPACKS
A list of every prize pack. Ensure this is sorted.

getRarity

public int getRarity()

public int getCost()

retrievePrizes

public Prize[] retrievePrizes()
Opens up this prize pack, returning a few random prizes of varying rarity.

getStars

public int getStars(int maxStars)
Returns the number of stars this pack has, based on its rarity. The number of stars is in the range [1, maxStars] (inclusive.)

Parameters:
maxStars - the number of stars this should have if it has maximum rarity. At other rarities this will be used as a scale.
Returns:
int the number of stars, between 1 and maxStars.

canUserAfford

public boolean canUserAfford(int points)
Parameters:
points - the number of points the user has/feels like spending.
Returns:
true if you can buy this prize pack with that number of points, false otherwise.

getAllPrizePacks

public static java.util.ArrayList<PrizePack> getAllPrizePacks()
Returns a list of each Prize Pack available.
